direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods interact with the underlying map to retrieve or modify the value associated with the key.
The setValue method internally calls the put method of the map, making it a direct substitute for testing.
Both methods handle null values and object comparisons, which can be tested for similar exception scenarios.
Both methods involve operations on the key and value, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods access and manipulate the key and value, although for different purposes (display vs. modification).
